metadata.description: Novelist KEVIN J. ANDERSON and superstar artist ALE GARZA bring you the swashbuckling story of your favorite interstellar pirates - THE STARJAMMERS! Young Tolo Hawk is a fresh-faced cadet in the Union Corps who dreams of a long and glorious military career. What will happen when he comes face to face with the lawless, rough and ready Starjammers?
metadata.name: Starjammers
